short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zen Clean: Refresh Tabs, Wipe Data, Control Cookies - Simplified!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zen Clean is the essential browser cleaner for optimizing your online experience.

Features:
-- Remove browsing data effortlessly: cache, cookies, download history, browsing history, storage data, passwords
-- Force-refresh tabs without cache for instant updates
-- Remove cookies on specific websites for enhanced privacy
-- Specify time intervals for data removal, from the last 1 hour to 24 hours

Install now!
